title: Starting Point
description: Every system begins with a single assumption. If that assumption is wrong, everything built on it can still appear stable.

title: Connection Hint
description: Nothing in the Realm exists alone. A correct step that ignores what comes before or after it is still an error.

title: Security Clue
description: In the Genova Realm, identity is noise. Validity is the only signal that determines trust.

title: Network Insight
description: Control is safest when it appears distributed. Failure becomes visible only when a single voice remains.

title: Final Hint
description: The system does not break from errors in parts. It evolves when all corrections align. Alignment is not repair.
